body_html:
The issue is that SparseTensor.get_shape calls tensor_util.constant_value_as_shape, which calls tensor_util.constant_value, which calls Graph.prevent_feeding.

@ebrevdo, what do you think the best way of solving this is? Perhaps in the SparseTensor constructor, we can set a new field with the TensorShape.
body_text:
The issue is that SparseTensor.get_shape calls tensor_util.constant_value_as_shape, which calls tensor_util.constant_value, which calls Graph.prevent_feeding.
@ebrevdo, what do you think the best way of solving this is? Perhaps in the SparseTensor constructor, we can set a new field with the TensorShape.
body:
The issue is that `SparseTensor.get_shape` calls [`tensor_util.constant_value_as_shape`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/framework/tensor_util.py#L751), which calls [`tensor_util.constant_value`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/framework/tensor_util.py#L714), which calls `Graph.prevent_feeding`.

@ebrevdo, what do you think the best way of solving this is? Perhaps in the `SparseTensor` constructor, we can set a new field with the `TensorShape`.
